name: svelte-semantic-ui
description: svelte actions and bindings for semantic-ui or fomantic-ui
_files: files to be included when is installed as a dependency

scripts.package: eslint . && vite build > /dev/null && echo Packaging... && svelte-kit sync && svelte-package && publint

_peerDependencies.svelte: see app.html and /routes folder for examples, but the library itself can be used without svelte-kit
_peerDependencies.jquery: jQuery must be staticly loaded in DOM for semantic ui to work
_peerDependencies.fomantic-ui-css: works with semantic-ui or fomantic-ui, packages may be imported or loaded in DOM
_peerDependencies.semantic-ui-css: for semantic-ui, add optional fomantic modules: calendar, slider, toast, and form

_dependencies._none: the library has no npm dependencies, but jQuery and senamtic-ui must be present at runtime
_dependencies.tslib: 2.9.0 - would be required if importHelpers is set to true in tsconfig.json
_dependencies.yup: 1.2.0 - plan to support yup validation, now it uses semantic-ui form
_dependencies.jquery: 3.7.1 - doesn't seem to work, needs to be imported in app.html
_dependencies.fomantic-ui-css: 2.9.3 - required for import variants C, D, E
_dependencies.semantic-ui-css: 2.5.0 - required for import variants D, E

_devDependencies.eslint-config-prettier: 9.1.0 - disables conflicting eslint rules; we prefer creating equivivalent eslint rules
_devDependencies.npm-run-all: 4.1.5 - allows to run npm tasks sequentially or in parallel; not yet required
